note:
San Diego, California.

I'm interested in many things WATER, so I follow news about local, regional, and general water issues--and sometimes technology--from a variety of sources.

I hope what I find and post here will interest you, too!

I'm a UCSD alumnus (1980) and am also retired from UCSD Library (now Geisel Library), where I was a serials cataloger and technical services automated systems manager in support of online library research databases.
